Original:
在熱鬧的夜市中，有一個調酒攤格外吸引人，每一杯調酒都有其獨特之處，酒保憑藉著他的高超技藝，調製出既無酒精味又口感順滑的飲品。
這樣的調酒，即使是對酒精味敏感的顧客也會樂於品嚐，不過，如果您是透過私人運具前來的顧客，請您三思而行，以安全為優先。
EN:
In the lively night market, there is a bartending stall particularly attractive. Each cup of bartending has its own uniqueness. With his superb skills, the bartender has prepared drinks that have no alcoholic and smooth taste.
Such bartending, even customers who are sensitive to alcoholic taste, will be happy to taste, but if you are a customer who comes through personal transportation, please think twice to take safety priority.
